translations: 溃疡；[病理] 溃疡形成

sentences.sentence: Below the vocal cords in this larynx are large ulcerations.
sentences.translation: 喉声带下方可见大溃疡。

sentences.sentence: In the upper GI endoscopic view below, there are rounded, erythematous ulcerations of the lower esophagus.
sentences.translation: 胃镜检查图，食管下部有圆的溃疡红斑。

sentences.sentence: The high-temp food will damage our Oesophageal mucosa and may even cause blisters, ulcerations and bleeding.
sentences.translation: 高温食物会损伤食道黏膜，严重时导致食道起泡、溃烂、甚至出血。
